CodeSchool

Shaping up with Angular.JS

Google has teamed up with the CodeSchool to offer a free course called Shaping Up with Angular.JS.

Course Resources

  • JavaScript II Google Group
  • The AngularJS website
  • The AngularJS API Docs
  • The Official AngualrJS YouTube channel
  • O'Reilly's AngularJS PDF book
  • Learn AngularJS with Egghead.io video tutorials
  • Douglas Crawford's, "JavaScript: The Good Parts"
  • Elloquent JavaScript by Marijn Haverbeke
  • The Mozilla Developer Network JavaScript Reference
  • JSHint code quality tool
  • Online JSON Editor
  • Chrome JSONView extension.
  • Firefox JSONView add-on.

Additional resource will be referenced throughout the course.
